Incom.org 2 Layout

Was an attempt to fully automate a book.

For my second colloquium I had to create a print documentation of all projects I did. I already had lots of documentations on incom.org. Thanks to Marcus Paeschke I got access to an unofficial API. That gave me the possibility to import all content via json. The result does not work out of the box. I even think without my support nobody else can use it but still… This set of scripts creates from a large dataset some nice graphics and a book.

It is published on github.com and under open source license.

This site is generated with gh-pages, jekyll and twitter bootstrap by fabiantheblind.
Get the source files over here. Oh. I almost forgot that boring legal stuff called impressum.
